title: Correction: Walmart
text:
Walmart is concerned about its business strategy if global temperatures rise 2 degrees above pre-industrial levels, rather than rising 2 per cent as incorrectly stated in an FT Weekend magazine article on October 15.

Source: 2022 'Correction: Walmart' FT.com 21 October. Used under licence from the Financial Times. Â© The Financial Times Limited 2022. All Rights Reserved.
